description:
beads-go has comprehensive list filtering that beads-rs lacks:
- Date range filters: --created-after, --updated-after, --closed-after
- Pattern matching: --title-contains, --desc-contains
- Priority ranges: --priority-min, --priority-max (partially done)
- Empty/null checks: --no-assignee, --no-labels, --empty-description

Files: src/cli/mod.rs, src/cli/commands/list.rs
title: Add richer list filtering (date ranges, pattern matching)

description:
**Problem**
CLI needs a structured dep cycles query; current Validate only returns free-form warnings.

**Design**
Add an IPC Request variant and QueryResult variant that returns dependency cycles as lists of BeadId strings. Use the CanonicalState helper for detection.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] New Request/Response types in src/daemon/ipc.rs
- [ ] QueryExecutor handles DepCycles and returns structured cycles
- [ ] Tests for query serialization + a simple cycle
title: Add daemon DepCycles query
